description: a(n) = square of product of first n primes.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
mathematica: a[n_]:=Product[Prime[i]^2, {i, 1, n}]; (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Dec 05 2008 *)
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,20,print(prod(k=1,n, prime(k)^2)))(PARI) { n=-1; m=1; forprime (p=2, prime(101), write("b061742.txt", n++, " ", m^2); m*=p ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 21 2001
